name: Tamer
overview: Tamer is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up game. The player flies a jet armed with an unlimited ammo cannon on the surface of Jupiter in order to reach and destroy the Communists rebel base. The planet is heavily guarded by rebellion fighters, tanks and other unidentified flying objects. Apart from hostile units the player must avoid collisions with rocks, space junk and other obstacles. One of the few Commercial SEUCK games released. The game was only commercially released in Poland.
